Posts.EditableText: I have multiple ending game in development which means many pages have the same content but some very small differences to reflect their choices is there a way to edit the code correctly to where i can copy pages (yes i know ill have to change the names of pages)
Posts.HTML: I have multiple ending game in development which means many pages have the same content but some very small differences to reflect their choices is there a way to edit the code correctly to where i can copy pages (yes i know ill have to change the names of pages)

Posts.EditableText:
Cut and past the text to each new page and change as needed...
or
Make one ending page with multiple "if" statements based on how they ended...
